update lender_bank_card
lender_id = #{lender_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bank_card_number = #{bank_card_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update lender_bank_card set lender_id = #{lender_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank_card_number = #{bank_card_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_address_code = #{bank_address_code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank_card_verify = #{bank_card_verify,jdbcType=INTEGER} where bank_card_id = #{bank_card_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
